sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update Purchasing Task state to "Closed Complete"

sys_hub_input_scripts.script: {"short_description":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"var err \u003d fd_data.subflow_inputs.error_message;\nreturn \"Error creating/updating purchase order in ERP: \" + err.split(/\\r?\\n/);","savedValue":""}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Update Purchasing Task state to "Closed Complete"

sys_variable_value.value: Description is same as Error Message
No Purchasing Task exists and Status is "Error"

sys_hub_input_scripts.script: {"short_description":{"scriptActive":true,"script":"var err \u003d fd_data.subflow_inputs.error_message;\nreturn \"Error creating/updating purchase order in ERP: \" + err.split(/\\r?\\n/);","savedValue":""}}
